metadata.title: CVE-2019-10087 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: On Apache JSPWiki, up to version 2.11.0.M4, a carefully crafted plugin linkinvocation could trigger an XSS vulnerability on Apache JSPWiki, related tothe Page Revision History, which could allow the attacker to executejavascript in the victim's browser and get some sensitive information aboutthe victim.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
